models.name: Gemini 3 pro
models.subtitle: Latest SOTA model from Google - DeepMind
models.description: Most capable Gemini model with a 1M context window; ideal for complex reasoning, long-document analysis, and multimodal tasks.

models.name: Gemini 3.0 Flash
models.subtitle: Near 3.0 pro performance at a fraction of the cost
models.description: Low-latency, cost-efficient variant that offers strong performance for real-time applications and high-volume inference.

models.name: Gemini 2.5 pro
models.subtitle: Balanced performance and affordability
models.description: Reliable mid-tier Gemini with strong reasoning and generation at a moderate cost; suitable for production workloads.

models.name: Gemini 2.5 Flash
models.subtitle: Cost-effective fast responses
models.description: Optimized for quick responses and simple tasks; great for chatbots, classification, and lightweight inference.

models.name: GPT 4.1
models.subtitle: OpenAI's advanced reasoning model
models.description: High-performing GPT variant with a 128K context window; excels at coding, complex reasoning, and detailed analysis.

models.name: GPT 4o (ChatGPT 4o)
models.subtitle: Fast and capable general-purpose model
models.description: Balanced model with strong speed and general-purpose capabilities; good for most applications requiring broad competence.

models.name: Grok 3 (beta)
models.subtitle: xAI's advanced model with massive context
models.description: High-context model (512K) suited for very large documents, deep context reasoning, and research-oriented tasks.

models.name: Grok 3 mini (beta)
models.subtitle: Lightweight and affordable Grok variant
models.description: Compact Grok model with a 64K context window; ideal for budget-conscious deployments and moderate-complexity tasks.

models.name: Claude 3.7 Sonnet
models.subtitle: Anthropic's most capable model
models.description: Top-tier Sonnet model with a 2M context window; designed for nuanced analysis, long-context understanding, and high-reliability outputs.

models.name: Grok 4 fast
models.subtitle: Blazingly fast Grok 4 model
models.description: Optimized for speed and efficiency; Grok 4 fast provides rapid responses for high-volume tasks while maintaining strong reasoning capabilities.
